comments: I am getting many errors while debugging with I20060315-1200. I will attach my log file.
Copy to clipboard action problem: dup of bug 131884.

This problem: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CustomHashtable.hashCode(CustomHashtable.java:252)

is a dup of bug 130852

The NPE in:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.actions.AbstractDebugActionDelegate.update(AbstractDebugActionDelegate.java:306)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.actions.AbstractDebugActionDelegate.selectionChanged(AbstractDebugActionDelegate.java:411)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.AbstractPartSelectionTracker$1.run(AbstractPartSelectionTracker.java:119)

looks like a dup of 131884 as well - the selection change is coming before the init(IAction).

Timeouts happen somtimes :-) Marking as dup of bug 130852, as other bugs are owned by workbench.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 130852 ***
